Variable: Land Use Soil Carbon :math:`\text{CO}_2` Emission Factor
Information: Annual average :math:`\text{CO}_2` emitted per ha due to soil carbon release from grazing (**CHECK THIS**)
Annual average :math:`\text{N}_2\text{O}` emitted per ha from liming and fertilization in grasslands (across degraded, native, and improved types)
